chunk:
Dr. Hauschka Eye Revive

Brand: Dr. Hauschka

Category: Around Eye Cream

Brand: Dr. Hauschka

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Euphrasia Officinalis Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Seed Extract, Alcohol, Anthyllis Vulneraria Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Rose Flower Oil/Extract, Geraniol*, Citronellol*.

Directions: Twist the top of the ampoule to open. Soak a cotton pad with the contents. Separate the top and bottom halves of the cotton pad, place on closed eyes and leave to work for about ten minutes

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
